data.name: ApplicationAlreadyRunning
data.value: Only one copy of the Elite Dangerous Launcher can run at a time.

data.name: CancelDownloadDetails
data.value:
If the download is cancelled and restarted later the download will be resumed if possible.
Files already downloaded may need to be downloaded again if an update is released between cancellation and the next download attempt.
The game will not be playable until the download is completed.
Are you sure you want to cancel?

data.name: ExpiredLauncherVersionDetails
data.value: A newer version of the Frontier launcher ({0}) is available and must be installed to continue playing. Do you want to download the installer now?

data.name: TimeSyncFailedDetails
data.value:
Failed to synchronise time with server. The application will now exit.
This is most likely to be a temporary network or server issue. Please check your connection to the Internet.
If you have not run the launcher for a long time you should also check for a newer version in case this one has been superseded.

data.name: CompletedConfidential
data.value: We will treat this report as confidential.

data.name: CompletedSuffix
data.value: for your system that you can send to us that will help diagnose issues that may be specific to certain systems.

data.name: FSSAATQ_InvalidServerResponse
data.value: Invalid response from server, unable to confirm verification code.

data.name: FSSALQ_InvalidServerResponse
data.value: Invalid response from server, unable to check validation code

data.name: FSSALQ_VerificationMessage
data.value: The verification code has now been sent to the email address associated with your Frontier Account. Please check your email without closing this box and enter the code into the box above. The codes may take several minutes to arrive. Please check your spam/junk folder.

data.name: FSSALQ_VerificationMessageDebug
data.value: As the server is in debug mode I can tell you the code you need is {0}

data.name: FSSIQ_InvalidCheckSum
data.value: Failed to determine installer verification code.

data.name: FSSIQ_InvalidLocalFile
data.value: Failed to determine local installer path.

data.name: FSSIQ_NoCheckSum
data.value: Server failed to provide installer verification code.

data.name: FSSIQ_NoDownload
data.value: Server failed to provide download information.

data.name: FSSIQ_NoLocalFile
data.value: Server failed to provide local file path.

data.name: FSSIQ_NoVersion
data.value: Server failed to provide version information.

data.name: FSSRSTQ_InvalidServerResponse
data.value: Invalid response from server, unable to obtain session token.

data.name: Confidentiality
data.value: This report will be looked into as soon as possible and will be treated as confidential.

data.name: CrashDumpSuffix
data.value: describing the issue that you can send to us.

data.name: HardwareSuffix
data.value: this will be sent along with the crash report to help identify potential factors.

data.name: PostApplication
data.value: ' has encountered a problem that it cannot continue from.

data.name: Request
data.value: Please tell us about this problem so we can look into it.

data.name: SupportRequestDescription
data.value: Please use the text box below to include any information regarding what you were doing when the crash occurred as this can be of great assistance in identifying why a problem is occurring.

data.name: LW_CancelWarning
data.value:
You have been sent an email containing a verification code.
If you cancel your log in at this point the code will be invalidated and you will need to wait for a new code to be sent next time you try to log in.
Click 'OK' if you want to wait for the existing code to arrive and enter it.
Click 'Cancel' if you want to cancel anyway and get a new code next time.

data.name: SLW_Instructions
data.value: Use the dropdown below to override the system default language with one of the supported languages. This will affect both the launcher and in game text. The launcher needs to be restarted to pick up the change.

data.value:

data.value: Failed to tidy files left by installer: {0}

data.value: Failed to create directory for installer

Exception downloading file, possible network failure:

data.name: RU_ServerWriteStreamExc
data.value: Failed to get stream for upload: {0}

data.name: PU_UpdateWriteException
data.value:
Failed to create or write to project directory. This indicates that the launcher has been installed to a location it does not have access to.
If you initially ran the launcher as administrator you will need to continue to run the launcher as administrator.
Please refer to the online FAQ for how to install the launcher without requiring to run as administrator.
The exception details were:
{0}

data.name: TicketLabel
data.value: If you require assistance with this crash, please open a Customer Support ticket at the following address:

data.name: RF_BrowserInitialisationFailure
EULA_PleaseRead
data.value: Please read the following license agreement. You must accept the terms of this agreement before using the Launcher.

data.name: MenuLogOutMachineTip
data.value: Log out the active user and unregister the machine. You will have to go through the verification process to log back in.

data.name: MenuCheckForUpdatesTip
data.value: Contact the server to see if any updates have been released since the last check.

data.name: MenuCheckForCacheTip
data.value: Check for a local cache of game files. If found files will be taken from the cache rather than downloaded from the server.

data.name: MenuCheckForVCacheTip
data.value: Build a cache of product files to avoid redownloading files that are already present. This can be helpful when moving from a beta release to a full version. May only be enabled when cache check is enabled.

data.name: MenuDetailedUpdateLogTip
data.value: When updating store a log containing details of actions taken and timings. This may help identify slow download issues.

data.name: MenuShowHardwareSurveyTip
data.value: Generate a hardware survey and display the results in a window.

data.name: MenuUploadHardwareSurveyTip
data.value: Generate a hardware survey and upload it.

data.name: MenuValidateGameFilesTip
data.value: Ensure all game files are up to date and have no local modifications.

data.name: MenuUninstallGameTip
data.value: Remove local files for the currently selected game. User files such as game saves will not be affected.

data.name: MenuSelectLanguageTip
data.value: Choose a different language for the launcher and game.

data.name: PU_TransferReadFailed
data.value: Failed to read from response stream. Network connection closed.

data.name: OSX_OutOfDateOS
data.value: The version of OS X you are running does not meet the minimum required to run the game. Please update to at least OS X 10.10.

data.name: MenuCheckForXInputTip
data.value: Check for the legacy XINPUT1_3.DLL. If not found the link to the support page will be opened. Disable if the launcher is incorrectly detecting the file as missing.

data.name: RW_RegisterCancel
data.value: Already have a Frontier Account? Close this dialog and "Log in"

data.name: RW_RegisterIntro
data.value: To play Elite: Dangerous, you need to own the game and create a linked Frontier Account.

data.name: RW_RegisterRequest
data.value: New Users: Please click on the Create Account button below to create a new account using your Steam profile.

data.name: RW_RedeemIntro
data.value: If you have purchased Elite Dangerous or Horizons Season Pass from Steam, please log out and select 'Steam Log In'.

data.name: OptionalLauncherVersionDetails
data.value: A newer version of the Frontier launcher ({0}) is available. Do you want close the launcher and download the new installer now?

data.name: MenuAlternativeDownloadTip
data.value: Use multiple threads for downloading game files. This may improve performance and reliability on some networks.

data.name: ProgressETETip
data.value: Estimate of time remaining if processing continues at the current rate.

data.name: ProgressRateTip
data.value: Estimate of the rate at which game data is being processed. Processing includes validation of existing files and downloading of new data. It is not a direct indication of network usage.

data.name: LW_NoRegistration
data.value: Please log in with your Elite: Dangerous account details.

data.name: OculusDirectRunWarningDetails
data.value: Please start Elite: Dangerous via Oculus Home. Starting this build directly may not work as expected and is not supported.

data.name: HU_Message
data.value:
The game requires an update before you can run it. You can check for updates within Oculus Home by selecting the 'Updates' option in your Library.
There may be a slight delay between the update being released on our servers and Oculus' servers. Thank you for your patience.

data.name: HU_MessageST
data.value:
The game requires an update before you can run it. You can manually check for updates by following these steps:
* Right click 'Elite Dangerous' in Steam * Go to 'Properties' and select the 'Updates' tab * Select the dropdown menu under automatic updates and chose 'High priority' * Close and reboot Steam
There may be a slight delay between the update being released on our servers and the Steam servers. Thank you for your patience.

data.name: PU_CreateFileExc
data.value:
Failed to create file for writing game data. Possible disk full or target filing system error. Exception details:
{0}

data.name: PU_PathTooLong
data.value:
Path too long to install all required files.
This can be fixed by installing the launcher to a location closer to the root of the drive.
Check online support for more information.

data.name: MenuMoveGameTip
data.value: Choose an alternate directory to store game files.

data.name: MenuRestoreGameTip
data.value: Use the default directory to store game files.

data.name: SelectInstallLocationInstructions
data.value: Select the folder where game files should be stored. Note that folders containing large numbers of unrelated files will increase cache generation time significantly.

data.name: InstallationInProgress
data.value:
Game files are currently being updated. Please allow the update to complete before closing.
You may cancel the installation if necessary but you will need to restart it and allow it to complete before you can play the game.

data.name: PU_InsufficientSpace
data.value: Insufficient space on drive to download file {0}, {1}B required.

data.name: RW_RedeemRequest

You need to link your Steam account to your Frontier Store account, or create a new Frontier Store account if you do not already have one. If you have previously logged in using a username and password chose "Reset Login" and use "Steam Log In".

data.name: UninstallWarning
data.value:
Uninstalling the game will remove all game files, including logs and screenshots.
Save files and settings are stored elsewhere and will not be removed.
Versions of the game using these files will be disabled in the launcher.
Are you sure you want to uninstall the game ?

data.value: The game must be installed before it can be updated.

Driver {0} is too old at version {1}.

data.name: WTHIS_Message
data.value:
The server was unable to confirm your Steam Library products.
If you already have a Frontier account you may be able to log in to the launcher using these details.
If your account was created through Steam, or you are still unable to login, please see this FAQ: [https://customersupport.frontier.co.uk/hc/en-us/articles/4404180354194-Elite-Dangerous-account-limitations-by-platform-Epic-Steam-Frontier-Console-]

data.name: HU_MessageEpic
data.value:
The game requires an update before you can run it. You can check for updates within Epic Games Store by going to your library, selecting the options for Elite Dangerous and choosing: Verify.
There may be a slight delay between the update being released on our servers and Epic's servers. Thank you for your patience.

data.name: TITLE_SubSuccessLinkEpicAndFD

data.name: TXT_Redeem25DigitCode
data.value: If you have a 25 digit code to redeem, you can do it here:

data.name: TXT_PasswordDatesAreEasy_9c7ac60c
data.value: Dates are often easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordAvoidDates_8260ff9b
data.value: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you.

data.name: TXT_PasswordAllCaps_d0f9e6e6
data.value: All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase.

data.name: TXT_PasswordTop10_d04fec50
data.value: This is a top-10 common password.

data.name: TXT_PasswordTop100_d9cb0d3b
data.value: This is a top-100 common password.

data.name: TXT_PasswordVeryCommon_5fefdb80
data.value: This is a very common password.

data.name: TXT_PasswordNearVeryCommon_9847c65c
data.value: This is similar to a commonly used password.

data.name: TXT_PasswordSingleWord_fe6d3a04
data.value: A word by itself is easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordNameSurname_ea60b49f
data.value: Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordCommonName_fa93fb1d
data.value: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordPredictableSub_74d5697c
data.value: Predictable substitutions like '@' instead of 'a' don't help very much.

data.name: TXT_PasswordAddWords_61edf813
data.value: Add another word or two. Uncommon words are better.

data.name: TXT_PasswordRepeats_1fb918fb
data.value: Repeats like "aaa" are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordRepeats_23829bf0
data.value: Repeats like "abcabcabc" are only slightly harder to guess than "abc".

data.name: TXT_PasswordReversedWords_18b0045b
data.value: Reversed words aren't much harder to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordSequenceLike_807fb9ae
data.value: Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordStraightKeyRows_ac4522c4
data.value: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordShortFBPatterns_50a6280f
data.value: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordLongKBPattern_1deedb29
data.value: Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns.

data.name: TXT_PasswordRecentYears_823d07f3
data.value: Recent years are easy to guess.

data.name: TXT_PasswordAvoidAssociatedYears_71568b72
data.value: Avoid years that are associated with you.

data.name: TXT_PasswordAvoidPhrases_8c4c0923
data.value: Use a few words, avoid common phrases.

data.name: TXT_PasswordMoreSymbols_f8de7985
data.value: No need for symbols, digits, or uppercase letters.

data.name: TXT_EmailAddressInUse
data.value: A Frontier account already exists with this email address.
